briefTitle: Trial of CF101 to Treat Patients With Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Phase 2/3 Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Dose-Finding Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Daily CF101 Administered Orally in Patients With Moderate-to-Severe Plaque Psoriasis
summary: Eligible patients with Psoriasis will be treated with CF101 or placebo twice daily for 16 weeks. All subjects will receive open-lable CF101 in weeks 17-32.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Achieving Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI) 75 at 12 Weeks
